name: DreadArmilla(Beta)
description:
Armilla Defender is a survival horror first-person shooter game in which the player fights against hordes of giant insects who act extremely aggressive. The player needs to fight their way through three stages with the goal of escaping at each stage’s final within a time limit.

In the game, players will assume the role of the last remaining human who wakes up in the city of pipes -- Armilla. While Armilla is invaded by dangerous insects who intend to drive out all human beings in the city. Players need to fight and get rid of insects with a variety of weapons (basically guns and knives) in order to survive the insect apocalypse.
